---
title: "Travel Itineraries"
output: html_document
---

```{r, results = 'asis', echo = F}
folder <- "forms_files/Travel/flight itineraries/"
year <- as.numeric(format(Sys.Date(), "%Y"))

#if updated folder not yet created run last years info
if(year %in% list.files(folder)){
  yr  <- year
} else {
  yr <- year-1
}


path <- paste0(folder, yr, "/")
travel_plans <- dir(path)


tmp_table <- tibble(full_file = travel_plans, 
       file = tools::file_path_sans_ext(gsub(" ", "_", travel_plans))) %>%
  mutate(Name = str_extract(file, "^[A-Za-z]+"),
         `Leg 1` = ifelse(grepl("leg_1|leg1|l1|_l.+1", tolower(file)), "x", ""), 
         `Leg 2` = ifelse(grepl("leg_2|leg2|l2|_l.+2", tolower(file)), "x", ""), 
         `Leg 3` = ifelse(grepl("leg_3|leg3|l3|_l.+3", tolower(file)), "x", ""), 
         `Leg 4` = ifelse(grepl("leg_4|leg4|l4|_l.+4", tolower(file)), "x", ""), 
         Conf_No = str_extract(file, "[A-Za-z]+$"),
         Link = paste0("[travel info](../", path, gsub(" ","%20",full_file), ")")) 

tabl <- tmp_table %>%
  select(Name:Link)



cat(paste("####", yr, "Survey Year"), '\n\n')

kableExtra::kable(tabl, format = "html", linesep = "",
                  align = c("l", rep("c",4),"l"))
```
